Work About

McDonald’s

Reprogramar a manhã.

(c) LüRZER'S ARCHIVE & 4 stars in DAVID REVIEWS

Links: ENG & PT

McDonald’s “The Robots” is like “Groundhog Day”– only this time with robots. Caught in a time loop, doing the same things over and over again, not being able to break out of the circle until the McDonald’s breakfast menu offers a helping hand, adding variety to the daily grind.

We had this served it with some radios on the side. Sunny side up.
Rádios - https://soundcloud.com/ndyuu/sets/reprogramar-a-manha-radios

TBWA C: Andreia Luísa A.D: António Belchior C.D: Marco Pacheco Director: Major Paco (Major West)
